hero.headline: Shop ${__Online__} with ${__Friends__}
hero.description: ${Kip} saves you money on 3rd party fees with wholesale prices.${br}Use Kip Now today!

services.tagDescrip: ${Kip} beats traditional web shopping by bringing all types of products into one place.

descrips.text: Never create another account. Buy from anywhere with a single click.
Share accounts like Amazon Prime without giving away passwords or personal data.
Track orders and expenses through Slack, Email, and Facebook Messenger.

images.bubble: Browse Items or Paste a URL to Add Things to Your Kip Cart
Use Kip to Store the Items you Love in the Cloud
Invite friends to Add to Your Kip Cart, Share Shipping and Other Fees

slackImages.bubble: Invite your whole team to order items
Search for things your team needs
Check out everyone's items at once

faq.title: FAQ
faq.subtext: Can't find your answer? Contact us at ${mail}

qs.title: How do I use kip?
qs.answer: Start using Kip by clicking ${[New Cart](/newcart)} and enter your email address to login${br}Select your favorite store and add items to Kip cart using search or copy - paste URL.${br}Check out the tutorial on ${[How Kip Works](/howitworks)} page

qs.title: How do I add other people to my Kip Cart?
qs.answer: Invite friends to Kip by clicking the +Share button on your Kip cart.${br}Copy the entire link and paste to share with anyone or tap the social media icons

qs.title: Is Kip Free?
qs.answer: Kip is 100% free for users. We make money through retailer affiliate fees to keep it free for you!

qs.title: How do I request a vendor/brand on Kip?
qs.answer: Tell us what brands and stores you want on ${[email](mailto:hello@kipthis.com)}, ${[twitter](//twitter.com/kiptalk)}, or chat with us!

qs.title: Is Kip available outside USA?
qs.answer: Yes! Learn more about Kip Global Direct and our shopping services into UK and Southeast Asia.${br}${br}If you don‚Äôt see your country, drop us a message on ${[email](mailto:hello@kipthis.com)}, ${[twitter](//twitter.com/kiptalk)}, or chat with us.

qs.title: I have an idea! How do I request a feature?
qs.answer: Tell us what features you want here or you can ${[email](mailto:hello@kipthis.com)}, ${[twitter](//twitter.com/kiptalk)}, or chat with us directly!

qs.title: Kip is broken, please help!
qs.answer: I‚Äôm sorry you‚Äôre having trouble. Contact us on ${[email](mailto:hello@kipthis.com)}, ${[twitter](//twitter.com/kiptalk)}, or chat with us and we will reply you ASAP. ${br}${br}Please describe the error and attach any screenshots if possible.

qs.title: I‚Äôm interested in partnering with Kip. How do I contact you?
qs.answer: We love partners! Fill out ${[this partner survey](//kip11.typeform.com/to/wYrY5w)} or email us directly at ${mail}

qs.title: Where can I use Kip?
qs.answer: Kip is great for groups of all sizes from roommates who want to split Amazon Prime fees to organizations who need to track expenses and manage teams remotely.${br}${br}If you have a unique way of using Kip, ${[let us know](mailto:hello@kipthis.com)}!

qs.title: Who is Kip?
qs.answer: Kip is a digital penguin that loves to frolic amongst internet deepsea cables. Being only 2 years old, sometimes they have difficulty understanding people. Their favorite food is emoji üçã üçâ üçá if you send Kip emojis, they will get happy!${br}${br}Underneath their round black eyes, they have a personality like an iceberg‚Ä¶${br}${br}Curious? Learn why ${[Kip is the first gender neutral AI](//medium.com/@kipsearch/no-butlers-30b92715f580)} and why ${[we chose penguins as our mascot](//medium.com/@kipsearch/no-butlers-30b92715f580)}.

team.title: Meet the Team
team.mission: Our vision is a universal shopping experience for groups that leverage their social power to get the best deals across the globe.${br}${br}Kip guarantees our customers the best service experience and speedy responses to your questions.

why.head: HI, I'M KIP THE PENGUIN
why.description: ${Kip} brings a penguin's perspective to collective purchasing.

reasons.text: Penguins protect each other. ${__Kip keeps your data safe__}, and doesn‚Äôt resell to 3rd parties.
Penguins help each other out, Kip helps you ${__split and share account fees like Amazon Prime__} with your team.
Penguins are social, Kip makes ${__coordinating team purchasing easy__}.
